Grand MasterAnswered on 22 May 2019Will anyone be splitting the mortgage with you? 3k a month is a bit of a stretch when it comes to mortgage payment.A simple way to keep track if you are ready to own a property is when your mortgage do not exceed 40% of your income. (I recommend to keep it in the 30-35% range)If you are using it for rent, rental income must be higher than the mortgage you are paying.0 comments3
